mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo.photo_mst ( account_no, photo_no, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at, is_deleted, photo_at, location_no, image_file_path, photo_japanese_title, photo_english_title, caption, direction_kbn, focal_length, f_value, shutter_speed, iso ) VALUES ( #{accountNo}, #{photoNo}, #{createdBy}, NOW(), #{updatedBy}, NOW(), false, #{photoAt}, #{locationNo}, #{imageFilePath}, #{photoJapaneseTitle}, #{photoEnglishTitle}, #{caption}, #{directionKbn}::photo.direction_enum, #{focalLength}, #{fValue}, #{shutterSpeed}, #{iso} )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(photo_no) AS photoNo FROM photo.photo_mst WHERE account_no = #{accountNo}
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>0 THEN true ELSE false END FROM photo.photo_mst WHERE account_no = #{accountNo} AND image_file_path LIKE CONCAT('%', #{imageFilePath}) AND is_deleted = false
